title: Flex Queue placement games (people to help me get silver)
body:
Hey fellow summoners!
I am trying to climb to silver in solo/duo queue however i am still yet to get a rank in flex queue. I have won 1 out of my 2 placement games played in flex queue and plan to win at least 6 more games to hopefully get placed in silver in flex queue to ease the stress on getting to silver in solo/duo. So if anyone would be able to help me carry 8 more games for a fairly easy win please add me. I am a jg, top main and play mid and adc occasionally. Feel free to help me get to silver solo q as well. If someone does help me get to silver i would also happily mystery gift you as it has been a dream to get to and alot of the players that i have on my team have no game sense in this elo :/

Add me on OCE: WilliK

replies.body: Yeah I got discord, realised ur on NA though
